column4: am I the only one who is having problems with firefox 3? My tabs somtimes don't work well
change your nick to something easier to type, if you want a beep, when someone answers you *g*. My firefox 3 is working properly. did you install addons?
No I did not, I did however start to use compiz-fusion again, but compiz-benchmark says I have 184 fps, so that shouldn't be a problem in the performance part
well when I'm surfing the web, I switch between tabs regualary but now when I click on an other tab, it just doesnt switch untill I click a second time
